net.tmachine.gpg.hue
Interface HUD

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseHUD, ShapeRenderer
public interface HUD
extends java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

The base type for all HUD implementations; contains the major callbacks needed by the heads-up-editing system.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getName()
          Each HUD should have a unique user-readable name; must be unique, since it is used as a key in Maps
 boolean isActive()
          Simply returns the value of the active flag

          Simply returns the value of the visibility flag
 void isVisible(boolean b)
          Used by the HUD-manager to inform this HUD when it has been made visible or hidden
 void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
          If this HUD is visible, it will be asked to paint to the supplied display surface during repaints
 void setManager(HUDManager am)
          Callback when added to a HUD manager to give the HUD a reference it can use to control or delegate to other HUDs etc
